alert.note: Alert for Clay; Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 11:11AM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, mixed at times with sleet or light freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, northeast Nebraska and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
